titleStmt.title: Mr. Smith's speech in Parliament made in the House of Commons on VVednesday the 29 of December, 1641 concerning the late tumultuous assemblies about the Parliament Houses.
Speech in Parliament made in the House of Commons on Wednesday the 29 of December, 1641
titleStmt.author: Smith, Philip, d. 1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
